application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
description:
In this role you will hire, train, and lead Value Consultants who enable customers and prospects to understand the positive economic impact that Google Cloud products, solutions, and services have on their businesses. You will also engage directly with our largest customers creating compelling financial justification that persuades a CFO to make a significant Google Cloud investment. Within your team, you create a culture that encourages success and helping each other succeed.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • MBA or equivalent practical experience in financial modeling and developing NPV, IRR, and Payback models.
  • 15 years of experience in Finance, Sales, Consulting, or Industry Solutions. Experience in management consulting with an international firm.
  • Experience with the cloud computing market.
  • Experience managing stakeholders.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience leading regional or global organizations.
  • Experience driving change management and salesforce transformation
  • Knowledge of value selling methodology and processes, opportunities, value chain, and value realization across cloud technology.
  • Ability to effectively operate with enthusiasm and adapt quickly in a fast-paced, constantly evolving team environment.
  • Passion for the Google Cloud Platform.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and formal presentation skills.
responsibilities:
• Consult on business value creation and implementation processes, including the development of business use cases that help create a value-based strategy for technology sales.
  • Track and capture data for use in current and future programs.
  • Write and publish white papers highlighting the financial benefits of Google Cloud Platform based on real world client experience.
  • Act as an advisor for management to collaborate on high priority agreements and other strategic initiatives
  • Lead an organization of value consultants.
title: Head of Value Consulting, Google Cloud
